titleStmt.title: The shepher'ds lamentation for his Phillis. Tune of, As I lay musing all alone.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J[osiah]. Blare at the Looking-Glass on London-Bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name, date and place of publication from Wing.
Verse: "As I lay musing all alone ..."
Includes: The jealous lover's complaint: or, His torment for love of fair Cloris. Tune of, While I lay gazing, &c.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
